subSections.title: Japanese
subSections.text: {{ja-kanji forms|辺|邊}}

subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text: {{ja-kanji|grade=4|rs=辵02|kyu=邊}}

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology 1
Pronunciation 1
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=o|へん|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

subSections.title: Noun
Pronunciation 2
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=o|へん|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

subSections.title: Noun
Etymology 2
Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|へ|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}
* This pitch accent pattern only applies to the noun sense.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|kyu=邊|へ}}

# [[place]], [[general]] [[area]], [[vicinity]]

subSections.title: Suffix
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|kyu=邊|suffix|へ}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=へ|obsolete}} [[place]], [[general]] [[area]], [[vicinity]]

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: The suffix sense underwent phonological changes, with the reading shifting to either ''e'' or ''be''. See also ''be'' below.

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|家|いえ}}: [[home]], [[abode]], [[house]]
* {{ja-r|古|いにしえ}}: a [[long]] [[time]] [[ago]]
* {{ja-r|沖%辺|おき%へ}}: [[offshore]], the [[open]] [[ocean]]
* {{ja-r|末%辺|すえ%へ}}: the [[area]] towards the [[end]] of something; the area near the [[summit]] of a [[mountain]]
* {{ja-r|前|まえ}}: [[front]]; [[forward]]
* {{ja-r|本%辺|もと%へ}}: the [[area]] towards the [[beginning]] of something; the area near the [[base]] or [[foothill]]s of a [[mountain]]
* {{ja-r|行%方|ゆく%え}}: one's [[destination]], one's [[whereabouts]]
* {{ja-r|後%方|しり%え}}: [[back]]; [[backward]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology 3
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|べ}}

subSections.title: Suffix
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|suffix|kyu=邊|べ}}

# [[place]], [[general]] [[area]], [[vicinity]]

subSections.title: Derived terms
Etymology 4
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|へた}}
From {{inh|ja|ojp|-|sort=へた}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref> Originally a compound of {{compound|ja|sort=へた|辺|tr1=he|t1=vicinity|pos1=see ''he'' above|た|tr2=ta|t2=place, area|pos2=the same ''ta'' element in {{m|ja|貴方}} ''anata'', now “you” in modern Japanese but previously meaning “that one over there”}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|へた}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|kyu=邊|へた}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=へた|obsolete}} the [[area]] near something or along the [[edge]] of something

subSections.title: Suffix
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|suffix|kyu=邊|へた}}

# the [[area]] near something or along the [[edge]] of something

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: In modern Japanese, this changes phonologically into either {{IPAchar|/-ppeta/}} or {{IPAchar|/-beta/}}.

subSections.title: Derived terms
Etymology 5
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|へち}}
From at least the late {{w|Heian period}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> Originally a compound of {{compound|ja|sort=へち|辺|tr1=he|t1=vicinity|pos1=see ''he'' above|ち|tr2=chi|t2=area?|pos2=the same ''chi'' element used to indicate general area in {{m|ja|こち}} ''kochi'', “around here, this area” and related words}}.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|へち|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|kyu=邊|へち}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=へた|obsolete}} the [[area]] near something or along the [[edge]] of something

subSections.title: Synonyms
Etymology 6
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|ほとり}}
From at least the {{w|Heian period}}.<ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref> Appears to be a compound or conjugation, but the ultimate derivation is {{unk|ja|nocap=1|sort=ほとり}}.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|ほとり|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR|acc2=3|acc2_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Noun
Etymology 7
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=irr|なべ}}
Appears to be a compound of {{compound|ja|sort=なべ|な|tr1=na|pos1=alternative form of {{m|ja|の}} ''no'', the possessive particle|辺|tr2=be|t2=vicinity|pos2=see ''be'' above}}.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=irr|なべ}}

subSections.title: Suffix
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|suffix|kyu=邊|なべ}}

# [[vicinity]], [[area]]

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: Only found in names.
